original_text: So I want to say this clearly to you today. If any of you have not believed in Jesus, it is not because of me.
korean_text: 그러므로 오늘 여러분에게 증언하거니와 모든 사람의 피에 대하여 내가 깨끗하니

sentences.original_text: So I want to say this clearly to you today
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 오늘 내가 너희에게 이것을 분명히 말하고자 한다

sentences.original_text: If any of you have not believed in Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 누군가 예수님을 믿지 않았다면

sentences.original_text: it is not because of me
